contents:
到不了主页，在这里水楼吐个槽，我刚看推特，最近观察的比较多，故意没有看中推，怕被传二手，希望和大家讨...


“We’re not going to tomorrow all the sudden have nobody for you to call for help. There will be thoughtful and intentional work that’s done, research engagement, learning that happens in a transition that will happen over time,” said Council Member Phillipe Cunningham.

Cunningham said he didn’t yet know who people would call in an emergency instead of 911.


似乎只是很初步的提议阶段，lets wait and see
